common.DisclaimerText: By proceeding, I agree that I have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of usage of 247 and consent to the same. I am voluntarily availing of the services provided on this platform. I am fully aware that I will not be undergoing a physical examination by a physician prior to a physician recommending  medical tests and/or treatment and/or the prescribing of OTC drugs. I am also aware that  the consultation on 247 Application does not preclude my rights to visit a physician and opt for a physical examination at any point in time and I am free at any time during the consultation to request for the same.
common.covidHelpText: We are here to help you.
common.covidMessageText: Apollo 247 has curated fact-based information from reputed sources on Coronavirus. Now you can get reliable answers to common questions at one place.
